issue.title: Heightmap extends far below ground plane

content.raw: that's the terrain skirt size. Unfortunately we don't expose an API for configuring this. If you're compiling from source, you can edit [Heighmap's function for configuring params](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/cd526975bc8bdf3813e0600e3ece180870602471/gazebo/rendering/Heightmap.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#Heightmap.cc-642) and add a OGRE call, [Ogre::TerrainGlobalOptions::setSkirtSize()](http://www.ogre3d.org/docs/api/1.8/class_ogre_1_1_terrain_global_options.html), to change the default skirt size from 10m to something else.
content.html: that's the terrain skirt size. Unfortunately we don't expose an API for configuring this. If you're compiling from source, you can edit Heighmap's function for configuring params and add a OGRE call, Ogre::TerrainGlobalOptions::setSkirtSize(), to change the default skirt size from 10m to something else.
